name: Float In The Sky
description:
Use WASD to move around. Mouse  to look around. Num1, Num2, Num3, Num4, Num5, and Num6 for rotating the stairs in different directions. If you couldn't move with WASD click once with our mouse in the game region.

Google chrome may have some lags during the game.

For a better experience you can download the game via the following link:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B7Ki_hFoRG9nbWtvR3BiMDlkY1E?usp=sharing
